0:
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.lobby
  - slashserver.survival
  - slashserver.survival2
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload
  family:
  - bungeecord.server.survival
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&1eviljungle lobby'
    address: mc-lobby-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  creative:
    motd: 'creative server'
    address: mc-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival:
    motd: 'Walker Survival SMP'
    address: mcsv-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival2:
    motd: 'Public Survival EZ-mode SMP'
    address: mcsv2-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3eviljungle &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  billimek:
  - admin
  - family
  AnsleyElla:
  - family
  BrinleyHarper:
  - family
1:
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.server
  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.creative
  - slashserver.survival
  admin:
  - bungeecord.command.alert
  - bungeecord.command.end
  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&mine.${SECRET_DOMAIN} lobby'
    address: mc-lobby-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  creative:
    motd: 'creative server'
    address: mccr-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival:
    motd: 'Survival'
    address: mc-survival-minecraft:25565
    restricted: true
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3mine.${SECRET_DOMAIN3} &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  EthanDstroyr:
  - admin

/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.title: redis helm release
/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.name: redis
/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.doc:
Redis is an open-source, in-memory data structure store that is used as a database, cache, and message broker. It provides a fast and flexible solution for storing and retrieving data, making it an ideal choice for a wide range of use cases, including real-time analytics, session management, and more.

Redis is used by Authentik, Authelia, oauth2-proxy.

0:
version: 2
global:
  private_key: /etc/dendrite/matrix_key.pem
  server_name: "${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}"
  well_known_server_name: "dendrite.${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:443"
  well_known_client_name: "https://dendrite.${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}:443"
  database:
    connection_string: postgresql://dendrite:${SECRET_DENDRITE_DB_PASSWD}@postgresql/dendrite?sslmode=disable
  cache:
    max_size_estimated: 600mb
  report_stats:
      enabled: true
  jetstream:
    storage_path: "/jetstream"
app_service_api:
  config_files:
    - /etc/dendrite/heisenbridge.yaml
media_api:
  base_path: /media
client_api:
  registration_shared_secret: "${SECRET_DENDRITE_REGISTRATION_SHARED_SECRET}"
mscs:
  mscs:
    - msc2836 # Threading
    - msc2946 # Spaces
    - msc2444 # Peeking over federation
    - msc2753 # Peeking via sync
sync_api:
  search:
    enabled: true
    base_path: /search
    language: "en"
logging:
  - type: std
    level: debug
